short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Shein product information from the store's homepage to a CSV file with one click, both the entire range or filtered results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Effortlessly Export Shein Store Products!
📦 Simplify your Shein product management! Export all product details in a single click and streamline your workflow.

🔧 How it Works:
1️⃣ Open a shein store's homepage or just any shein product page.
2️⃣ Click open our extension, then click the Export Products button.
3️⃣ Done! Sit back and just wait a moment, let our extension handle the rest.

🔥 Key Features:
1️⃣ Comprehensive Export: Export data fields include: store_name, store_follower, store_score, sku, product_name, product_url, detail_image_1, detail_image_2, total_sale, retail_price, sale_price, estimated_price, estimated_discount, stock.
2️⃣ Easily apply filters on the Shein homepage, then reopen the extension and effortlessly download the filtered results. Simplify your product search and enjoy seamless access to the information you need.

🎯 Targeted Users: Shein store owners, data analysts, and competitor researchers alike.

💡 Benefit from our dedicated support team! We're here to assist you at every step and provide prompt, knowledgeable help.

💪 Take control of your business data management and make informed decisions with Shein Store Product Exporter today!

Note: This extension is an independent creation and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Shein. ❗️🔒
